import React,{useContext} from 'react' import { userTracker } from '../context/userTracker' import { useState } from 'react' import axios from "axios" import {Link,useNavigate} from 'react-router-dom' const AddAssesment = () => { //useState for the inputs for register page const [inputs,setInputs] = useState({ assesName:"", startDateTime:"", endDateTime:"", }) //function to handle change in input const handleChange = e => { setInputs(prev=>({...prev, [e.target.name]: e.target.value})) } return(
